name.name: name
name.description: Partial or complete name of the entity.

country.name: country
country.description: Country name or ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the entity.

source.name: source
source.description: The name of the source from which the entity was imported.

contract_count_min.name: contract_count_min
contract_count_min.description: Minimum number of contracts in which the entity is involved (as either buyer, seller or founder).

contract_count_max.name: contract_count_max
contract_count_max.description: Maximum number of contracts in which the entity is involved (as either buyer, seller or founder).

contracted_amount_min.name: contracted_amount_min
contracted_amount_min.description: Minimum amount sum of contracts in which the entity is involved (as either buyer, seller or founder).

contracted_amount_max.name: contracted_amount_max
contracted_amount_max.description: Maximum amount sum of contracts in which the entity is involved (as either buyer, seller or founder).

amount_min.name: amount_min
amount_min.description: Minimum nominal amount of the contract.

amount_max.name: amount_max
amount_max.description: Maximum nominal amount of the contract.

start_date_min.name: start_date_min
start_date_min.description: Mimimum beginning date of contract execution

start_date_max.name: start_date_max
start_date_max.description: Maximum beginning date of contract execution

party_name.name: party_name
party_name.description: Name of a company, institution or person participating in a contracting process.

party_type.name: party_type
party_type.description: Together with party_name, specifies it's role in the contracting process. Possible values buyer, supplier, funder, all.

procurement_method.name: procurement_method
procurement_method.description: Together with party_name, specifies it's role in the contracting process. Possible values direct, open, selective, all.

Contract.description: A contracting process in an OCDS recordPackage
